meta.name: 1.2 Implementation of all measures and controls

b7fb2036-9e07-5a3a-8ced-5924ede9138f.title: FREQUENCY: Prior to the first concrete pour

1d91534e-1b97-5062-8618-9e8cb225bb10.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed

f96edfc4-b65a-58cc-935b-45eb7c13f96f.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Structural Concrete Design & Submission ITP completed and signed.

6c718766-34aa-59a0-874d-8a4314740340.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Reinforcement schedule has been prepared for the reinforcement supply, to ensure that it achieves the specified tolerances on member dimensions, concrete cover and specified locations

fb134d89-2362-59d9-92d8-0548d92a4f14.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed

5e136b9b-764f-5a91-b745-8b89f6a66660.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The Contractor shall notify the Superintendent for inspection of the pile excavation by the Superintendent. Prior to inspection, the pile excavation shall be de‑watered and the walls and base of the pile cleaned out, including the internal surface of the casing, to remove all mud, loose or foreign material.

5820acdd-0f22-5704-a437-d62ddfeb9531.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed

254072db-72c6-533b-a060-4531fe970ef3.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed

a8945cb6-d911-5d56-a837-2e54bfa69807.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Designed and constructed in such a manner so it can be removed without damage to the concrete. Formwork/shoring shall be placed in locations where steel reinforcement and other fixtures can be inspected, and sufficiently tight at joints to prevent loss of slurry

1ca5eb69-6f7a-57f0-add7-cfb7f1a412dc.title: ○ Concrete shall be placed through a tremie tube and shall not be dropped from a height greater than 2 m through air.

62657f8d-d69e-5a15-9694-f3456d3b373c.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Further to the requirements of clause 611.10 spacers and supports for bored pile steel reinforcement shall be placed at intervals of no more than 2 m along the full length of the steel reinforcement cage to ensure that the specified concrete cover to the steel reinforcement is maintained.

0e391a56-0d88-5840-b611-415659a29782.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed

2c406926-3958-5ff0-a0c5-204ddc8437c6.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed

b581007c-f9de-536d-89e8-c92e81d693cc.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Concrete shall not be placed until all foreign material has been completely removed from the forms

683e4e2f-64d5-5a76-962a-6bfc151e6bdd.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed & Pre-Pour checklist completed

7bcabd99-e540-5b11-9bca-ad405a47f0e2.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Superintendent confirms that the inspected formwork, reinforcement, rag bolt assembly and embedments comply with the project drawings and specifications.

meta.name: 3.2 Correct forms, reinforcements, rag bolt assembly and embedments

640a9bd5-f8ab-57c4-935a-7fc95fcc6503.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Reinforcement and/or concrete shall not be placed until the proposed method of removing mud, loose rock or similar materials has been reviewed by the Superintendent.

7f2a11d5-f9df-5531-bac9-515db03335db.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed

3aec5dd8-b6d7-5d9c-9df1-cb9ff47e7f9f.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Concrete shall not be place when temperature is <5°C or > 35°C All steel components that are in contact with the concrete shall be cooled to below 32°C before concrete is placed

67769a6f-99bd-5181-9425-2952701cfc52.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed

f4482f59-3b42-5bc2-baf4-d12226c764c1.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed

c29d5d5b-b737-561b-a81b-39543e2bcc8c.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Sampling in accordance with 610.16

97a41ca6-f8c3-5a86-aa52-d38c7701ca9d.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Discharge time (concrete placed and compacted) < 90 minutes from batch time unless approved otherwise. Batch to be used has a discharge time of 180 minutes.

1b69e184-fd0f-5b4e-b545-d62cf4cec681.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed. Accurate Site Notes & Load Mapping

bd01f028-3e57-5904-ad0f-245790879df0.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Concrete shall be tansported, handled and placed in a manner that will prevent segregation or loss of materials In continuous pours the max. time lag between truckloads on site is 25 minutes

abced5e3-43eb-5491-ac36-c085e3b72c35.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed

de134a5b-7f76-5a02-b0fb-839983c65f06.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed

852d08dd-edf0-5daa-ab64-c61c518e64fb.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Unless otherwise approved by the Superintendent, temporary casing shall be used to prevent collapse of holes during the excavation operation.

ea742c5c-07f3-55b3-b663-901c1acd2447.title: ○ Care shall be taken to prevent soil and rock dislodging from the side of the hole and contaminating the concrete forming the minimum cover to the reinforcement.

96e16827-75fc-5b24-a07d-5963f045a359.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed

d54925b7-0d94-556c-9790-053a09fd4b40.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Sufficient time shall be given for the concrete to cure prior to loading.

96dbf162-c954-5b24-a482-9638ede2e418.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed

60354908-e6a2-5213-9033-f5c8188e6ed1.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Formwork shall be removed carefully and in such a manner as to avoid damage to the member or the concrete surfaces and maintain safety at all stages of removal. Formwork and formwork supports shall not be disturbed or adjusted during the concreting operation

b2be3fe3-cd4c-5991-a17f-05e2bfbfcb6a.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed, Post Pour Checklist completed

e1ec3de2-7969-581c-b50d-1bfd617ebaec.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The centre of the pile head shall be in the specified plan position ±75 mm;

cd7b86ac-b3c1-55ac-aa50-045380bca5f2.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed

f4e750f5-54ff-5b12-a64f-cdd5bb9d5e95.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: No pile construction shall be commenced within 2.5m clear distance of a newly cast pile until the concrete in the pile has attained a strength of 15 MPa.

62ea9cc4-8594-5ea9-97e6-f02423141bf7.title: FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any piling

3b7d1cc9-f450-5ba2-89c6-9cab31096127.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed

374ca4f7-daa1-57aa-9b08-0d7cb4cf436c.title: ○ Installation of piles by methods which involve driven temporary casing or result in significant vibration shall not be carried out within the distance 2.5 m to 9.0 m until the concrete in the pile has attained a strength of 15 MPa and set for a minimum of 24 hours.

29c7eee4-974f-5ba6-9f8e-eac9b80af8fc.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
